creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text:
Ant task that builds a TC 5.5 release includes running a series of tests.

With the current tc5.5.x trunk code those tests display failures,
because of license headers.

Authentication:
   [tester] FAIL [GET /tester/protected/Authentication04 HTTP/1.0] Expected data 'Authentication04 PASSED', got data '<!--'

ErrorPage:
   [tester] FAIL [GET /tester/ErrorPage05?type=Array HTTP/1.0] Expected data 'ErrorPage06 PASSED - JSP', got data '<!--'
   [tester] FAIL [GET /tester/WrappedErrorPage05?type=Array HTTP/1.0] Expected data 'ErrorPage06 PASSED - JSP', got data '<!--'
   [tester] FAIL [GET /tester/ErrorPage05?type=Number HTTP/1.0] Expected data 'ErrorPage06 PASSED - HTML', got data '<!--'
   [tester] FAIL [GET /tester/WrappedErrorPage05?type=Number HTTP/1.0] Expected data 'ErrorPage06 PASSED - HTML', got data '<!--'

and so on...

A trivial fix will be s/<!--/<%--/ s/-->/--%>/ around those licenses.

May be some other pages, besides the test ones, deserve the same fix?
